name: The Hunt for Mister X
description:
Hey all!

Try this out and let me know if you find any bugs. I started this as a class project, but I recently decided to look at it again. There might be an update sometime.

Current list of stuff to do (If you have a suggestion, let me know):

-add a nice border

-replace spacebar with something else because scrolling

-add formal explanation of what yellow tile does

-work on code formatting

-add more yellow tile levels

-add a new element to the game (new type of tile or something)

-add music controls

-make it clickable

Yeah. Thanks for playing!
